column5: looks like the ice at Jordan Harbour has left.Recieved a call from a bud that was driving by and said the guys were fishing from the docks.  FishFarmer,I would check out 50 point Marina to make sre you guys stlill will have ice for your Derby.  Steve
I expect with the snow, freezing rain and rain combination southern ontario is getting will not help out the ice anywhere.  Temps above freezing tomorrow and on the weekend too.

thanks steve thats great to know,we will be out there maybe the second or 3rd weekend of april,we go out of port dalhouise,so please keep the updates comming and maybe i will see you out there fishing for salmon....cheers
